pages.text: $(li)Coral Squids are a type of cephalopods that likes to hang out around corals in $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/warm_ocean)Warm Oceans$(/l).$(br)$(li)They have 5 different colors $(li)Yellow $(li)Red $(li)Pink $(li)Purple $(li)Blue
They may drop their corresponding coral color on death.
